duties_responsibilities.duty: Conducting primary and secondary research to support project objectives and help structure problems.
Developing and presenting insights and recommendations to internal team members and external stakeholders.
Analyzing complex, high-volume data sets to identify trends and actionable insights.
Building high-quality visualizations to illustrate the stories underlying the data.
Supporting survey development, execution, and report building, including content development and survey design.
Creating white papers, industry reports, or improving methodologies focused on sponsorship valuation, collegiate landscape, live entertainment venues, or professional leagues.

education_certification.credential: Enrolled in a full-time MBA program and in-between first and second years of enrollment.
